sections.heading: Escheats; when title vests in state
sections.text: Upon the failure of heirs, the title shall vest at once in the state, without an inquest or other proceedings in the nature of office found.SourceLaws 1875, § 2, p. 52;R.S.1913, § 6272;C.S.1922, § 5686;C.S.1929, § 76-501;R.S.1943, § 76-401.AnnotationsEscheat must
